description:
Official Mobile Guide to Alaska's Best Places
Whether you're visiting Alaska or live here, The Alaska App is your ultimate interactive Alaskan discovery guide. 

What makes this app different? You can:
  •  Interact: Spot a moose? Find a great photo location? Share it in real time—and browse other travelers' posts. 
  •  Get Aerial Views: Curious what nearby mountains, valleys, or parks look like from the air? We've shot stunning fly-over videos from camera-mounted airplanes.
  •  See Weather Cams: View more than 600 weather cams throughout Alaska.
  •  Get Wildlife Info: GPS coordinates to hundreds of little-known wildlife-viewing locations most Alaskans don't even know about.
  •  Send ePostcards: Share your adventures!

Plan Your Trip
  •  Guides:The best Alaskan hotels, cruises, tours, attractions, restaurants, shopping, and nightlife—plus tips on when to visit and where to go.
  •  Videos: 120 cinematic, custom videos of Alaska's best tours and destinations 
  •  Expert Advice: What to do if you encounter a bear or moose, how to take great Alaska photos, and much more.
  •  Request free itinerary recommendations from local Alaska experts.

Get Insider Secrets
  •  Audio Guides: Bush pilots, park rangers, and wilderness guides tell you about their favorite places. 
  •  Hot Spots: We'll direct you to the best glaciers, mountains, parks, trails, scenic viewpoints, ghost towns, and wildlife-viewing spots.
  •  Cabins, RV Parks, Campgrounds: See photos, sort by amenities, and make reservations.
  •  Best Restaurants: Search 1,500 dining and nightlife spots by cuisine, price, family-friendly, romantic, and more.

Reviews
App store reviewers call The Alaska App one of the best travel apps:  
  •  "All travel apps should use the Alaska app as a model..."
  •  "I've lived here my whole life. This app has taught me things I never knew."
  •  "Nowhere else have I found an app with this much useful, intuitive, and accurate info..."

Download this free app today!
releaseNotes:
• Added help screens and on-demand database updates, so you always have the latest
 • Weather – We now refresh over 500 weather cams every 10 minutes and added hyperlocal weather forecasts 
 • New content – 60 walking tour locations, 50 wildlife viewing spots, 20 Mt. McKinley viewpoints, 20 Waterfalls, and dozens more cool places for you to explore
 • See our support page at alaska.org/app or email bob@alaska.org if you need assistance
